description:
When Inuki, who was like a brother to Jun, is killed by Chihiro, Jun swears revenge.
Shoko plots to become the last remaining survivor so she can become the Lord of Vermilion.
Yuri continues to have secret meetings with Chihiro.
Unbeknownst to one another, the vessels of Heroic Lineage begin to turn their various motives into action.
Meanwhile, Chihiro has a dream in which Kotetesu dies...?!
Source: crunchyroll

titles.title: Douka Futari no Te o Seinaru Kotoba de Musunde Kudasai
Please Join Our Hands with the Holy Words
どうか二人の手を聖なる言葉で結んでください
